title: Breakdown : Sudden 36-hour water cut for 5 areas in Colombo
content: A 36-hour water cut will be imposed in several parts of Colombo from 10.00 am today.The National Water Supply and Drainage Board (NWSDB) said that the water supply will be disrupted due to a sudden breakdown in the main pipeline.Thereby, a water cut will be imposed in Colombo 1, 7, 9, 10, and 12, while water will be supplied under low pressure to Colombo 8 and 11.
